text: I can't believe he's actually trying this! It's impressive but also seems a bit insane.
Well, you know what they say, there's a fine line between genius and insanity.
I'd like to see the sun-shades he's going to use to protect the colonists from the, you know, SUN.
IS IT JUST ME, OR DOES ELON KEEP FINDING WAYS TO PUSH THE BOUNDARIES OF MAD SCIENCE??
I'm holding out for a Dyson sphere announcement.
That would be one heck of a Tesla solar panel upgrade.
Imagine the energy savings if we can just harness the sun's energy directly from the surface!
Sure, but how do we cool things down enough to live there?
Clearly, the answer is nighttime landings.
That moment when you realize the title wasn't a joke...
I wonder if he'll accept Dogecoin for a one-way ticket to the sun?
The real question is, how will this impact Starlink?
They'll probably add a solar flare detection system to give users a heads up before they lose connection.
Yeah, but then everyone's internet would go down during the daytime.
I guess that's one way to enforce work-life balance.
